rules.natural: If the survivor has a shelter at the riverbank, then provided that the survivor can identify edible fish, under the condition that there is no ongoing storm in the region, the survivor has the fishing skill.
Whenever the survivor has a shelter in a cave and can identify edible fish, if there is no ongoing storm in the region, then the survivor has the fishing skill.
In case the survivor found an emergency kit as supplies, then the survivor has a shelter at the riverbank.
The survivor found an emergency kit as supplies or the survivor found a survival guide as supplies.
Provided that the survivor encountered a flood warning phenomenon, the survivor received an evacuation alert.
On the condition that the survivor received an evacuation alert, if the survivor found a survival guide as supplies, then the survivor has a shelter in a cave.
Assuming the survivor learned the friction method primitive, the survivor mastered the fire-making technique.
The survivor learned the friction method primitive or the survivor learned the solar method primitive.
Either the survivor discovered flint as a resource or the survivor discovered dry grass as a resource.
If the survivor has fish as food, then the survivor has the fishing skill.

rules.prover9_expression: (discovered_resource(survivor, dry_grass) -> (learned_primitive(survivor, solar_method) -> (in_region(survivor, flooded_zone) -> (-has_storm(region, ongoing) -> has_food(survivor, fish)))))
rules.natural: Under the condition that the survivor discovered dry grass as a resource, if the survivor learned the solar method primitive and is in the flooded zone with no ongoing storm in the region, then the survivor has fish as food.
If the current location is dangerous for the survivor, then it is not safe for the survivor.
The survivor is in the flooded zone or the survivor is in the forest zone.
Provided the survivor is in the forest zone and there is no ongoing storm in the region, the survivor has fish as food.
In case the survivor has a fishing rod tool, then the survivor knows the fishing game.
The survivor has a fishing rod tool or the survivor has an improvised net tool.
Given that the survivor has an improvised net tool, should the survivor be in the flooded zone and there be no ongoing storm in the region, then the survivor has fish as food.
Provided the survivor can navigate the river, the survivor can identify edible fish.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(discovered_resource(survivor, flint) -> (learned_primitive(survivor, solar_method) -> (in_region(survivor, flooded_zone) -> (-has_storm(region, ongoing) -> has_food(survivor, fish))))) -> has_conflict(survivor, other_survivors))
rules.natural: If it is not the case that discovering flint leads to having fish under specific conditions, then the survivor has conflict with other survivors.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(discovered_resource(survivor, flint) -> (learned_primitive(survivor, solar_method) -> (in_region(survivor, flooded_zone) -> (-has_storm(region, ongoing) -> has_food(survivor, fish))))) -> -has_conflict(survivor, other_survivors))
rules.natural: If it is not true that discovering flint implies having fish under certain circumstances, then there is no conflict between the survivor and other survivors.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(in_region(survivor, flooded_zone) -> (-has_storm(region, ongoing) -> has_food(survivor, fish))) -> is_safe(survivor, current_location))
rules.natural: Should the condition for having fish in the flooded zone without a storm not hold, then the current location is safe for the survivor.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(in_region(survivor, flooded_zone) -> (-has_storm(region, ongoing) -> has_food(survivor, fish))) -> is_dangerous(survivor, current_location))
rules.natural: Under the condition that being in the flooded zone without a storm does not guarantee having fish, then the current location is dangerous for the survivor.
